title: caffe2 conda package needs GLIBC_2.23
body_html:
I installed conda caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7, received this error:

Python 3.6.6 | packaged by conda-forge | (default, Jul 26 2018, 09:53:17)
[GCC 4.8.2 20140120 (Red Hat 4.8.2-15)] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

import onnx
import caffe2.python
import caffe2.python.onnx
import caffe2.python.onnx.backend
WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode.
CRITICAL:root:Cannot load caffe2.python. Error: /lib64/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.23' not found (required by /misc/voute1_ptl-bema1/visi/envs/nidec01-caffe2/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/../../../../libcaffe2.so)

Any idea why I should need GLIBC_2.23

body:
I installed conda caffe2-cuda9.0-cudnn7, received this error:

Python 3.6.6 | packaged by conda-forge | (default, Jul 26 2018, 09:53:17) 
[GCC 4.8.2 20140120 (Red Hat 4.8.2-15)] on linux
Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
>>> import onnx 
>>> import caffe2.python
>>> import caffe2.python.onnx
>>> import caffe2.python.onnx.backend
WARNING:root:This caffe2 python run does not have GPU support. Will run in CPU only mode.
CRITICAL:root:Cannot load caffe2.python. Error: /lib64/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.23' not found (required by /misc/voute1_ptl-bema1/visi/envs/nidec01-caffe2/lib/python3.6/site-packages/caffe2/python/../../../../libcaffe2.so)

Any idea why I should need GLIBC_2.23
